data.name: Tiger Knight: Empire War - Supply Pack
data.detailed_description:
Including:
Soldier Seal (B) x10
General Seal (B) x10
VIP (7 Days)
—————
The Soldier Seal and General Seal are used to boost the EXP gains of soldiers and adjutants after winning PVP battles.
VIP can help increase 30% of copper coins, prestige and EXP gains in any battles.
data.about_the_game:
Including:
Soldier Seal (B) x10
General Seal (B) x10
VIP (7 Days)
—————
The Soldier Seal and General Seal are used to boost the EXP gains of soldiers and adjutants after winning PVP battles.
VIP can help increase 30% of copper coins, prestige and EXP gains in any battles.
data.short_description: This DLC can help your soldiers and adjutants get more EXP and grow faster.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 32bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual core or equipment
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx9 compliant graphics card with 1024MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 64bit
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz 4 core or equipment
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx11 compliant graphics card with 2048MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
